title: International visitors, exhibitors impressed by Light of Internet Expo
text:
The Light of Internet Expo 2019 opened in Wuzhen, Zhejiang province on Oct 18.

The five-day expo is an important part of the sixth World Internet Conference set to be held in the riverside town from Oct 20-22.



More than 600 firms from home and abroad are attending this year’s event, showcasing the latest technological achievements in cloud computing, big data, artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, industrial internet, e-commerce, and digital media.

It attracted many international visitors who were impressed by the technologies displayed at the expo.
description: The Light of Internet Expo 2019 opened in Wuzhen, Zhejiang province on Oct 18.
